title: Credential manager: disallow repo entries that point to the same file
author: sparerd
body_snippet:
*This is only relevant for credential manager work being developed under #208*

If I try to add a credential repository whose file path exactly matches a credential repo already in the system, then the system should provide an error and not add the repo. In some situations, it may be necessary to pick a new file path (such as during a cred repo upgrade).

iterations.description: Valid enhancement request to prevent duplicate credential repository entries pointing to the same file, which could cause data conflicts or user confusion
